tool_description: Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to product, price, sales, rank and reviews data from Amazon in JSON format
name: BBS Amazon Data Scraper
title: BBS Amazon Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bbs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/B086MGY9TZ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bbs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bbs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
